entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:02 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -11.6°C
Wind: ENE 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing late this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
